text: MCC: The engineers have had a go at the radio issues, let's give it a try.
Patrick: Roger, let's hope they have solved the issue. Switching to internal comms.
Patrick: On intern.. com..s, how do y.. read..?
MCC: Still as bad as before.
Patrick: I c..n't hear ..u. Can't believe ... are still having .......  issues!
MCC: Ok, let's switch back to pad comms.
Patrick: FIRE! We .... a fire in ... cockpit!
MCC: GET THEM OUT OF THERE!
THE CREW WAS KILLED BY A FIRE
THE CABIN WAS FILLED WITH 100% OXYGEN, AN EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE SUBSTANCE
A SPARK FROM AN EXPOSED WIRE STARTED A FLASH FIRE WHICH INSTANTLY ENGULFED THE CABIN
IN MEMORY OF THOSE WHO LOST THEIR LIVES IN THE APOLLO 1 FIRE
CAMPAIGN III: THE DARK SIDE OF THE MOON
